Information Text: Ranked among top national universities in multiple rankings.
Northeastern's CS program is highly ranked nationally.
Undergraduate tuition is approximately $67,990 per year.
On-campus housing costs about $13,148 per year.
Main campus located in Fenway Cultural District, Boston, MA.
93% of undergraduates employed or in graduate school within 6 months.
Early Decision/Action: Nov 1, Regular Decision: Jan 1.
Middle 50% GPA range of admitted students: 4.2–4.5.
Test-optional; SAT/ACT accepted but not required.
Similar GPA expectations to domestic students, varies by program.
Counseling, disability support, student engagement programs available.
Private research university in Boston; famous for co-op and experiential learning.
